Title: Red Cliff II
Writer: John Woo (screenplay), Khan Chan (screenplay), Cheng Kuo (screenplay), Heyu Sheng (screenplay), Guanzhong Luo (novel)
Actors: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Fengyi Zhang, Chen Chang
Plot: Second and final part of an epic tale about a legendary ancient battle that changed the course of China history.
Country: China, Hong Kong, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea
